item.description:
Hello, I would like to put on my first event for the club by inviting everyone in our meetup group to come out and meet each other for a "Green Day/Water Day" event. Come out and enjoy a day of relaxing fun by boating, barbecue and discussing energy and sustainability . We will have several boat's to play with, including kayak's, jet ski's, a ski boat, a sail boat.(a donation bucket will be available if you would like to help out with the gas).

It would be great if you could bring your own boat out and share it with others!

We will be combining this event with my other meetup group called "Trailblazers"

We will be having a Pot Luck so bring something to share!

See you all there!

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the kayak
item.name: Green Day Water Day
